tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clothing_inventory ( 
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    store_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    quantity INT NOT NULL, 
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_items (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   item_name TEXT,
   category TEXT,
   quantity INT,
   store_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   item_id INT,
   store_id INT,
   quantity INT,
   last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE store_inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES clothing_items(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES store_locations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity_sold INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES clothing_items(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES store_locations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE store_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE clothing_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    item_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    item_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_levels (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES clothing_items(item_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES store_locations(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity_sold INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES clothing_items(item_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES store_locations(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    total_sales DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES store_locations(location_id)
)
